text:
Stylight | Munich | Germany | Visa & Relocation support

At Stylight we build a fashion website where users find inspiration and can search for fashion. We're among Munich hottest startups and quite international. English is our company language and we have colleagues from 20+ nations. We run joint engineering and business teams, to maximize the impact of each engineer.

-----------------------------------------------------------

We're hiring:

* Senior Full Stack Developer (http://stylig.ht/Senior_Fullstack_Developer)

* Junior System Administrator (http://stylig.ht/1rgJXj5)

* Web Developer (Brand Marketing) (http://stylig.ht/24Zbt3i)

* Technical Account Engineer (http://stylig.ht/1ZrqR5a)

-----------------------------------------------------------

Interested? Contact me on sandra.jasarevic@stylight.com. Want to know more about us? Check out our Tech Blog: http://tech.stylight.com/
